also_known_as: อินทิรา เจริญปุระ
ทราย เจริญปุระ
biography: Intira Charoenpura, also known by the nickname Sai or Sine is a Thai actress and singer. She is known for her role as Mae Nak in the 1999 Thai horror film, Nang Nak. In 2007, she was featured in a prominent role as the warrior Princess Loehkin in part two of King Naresuan.
name: Intira Jaroenpura
